RING39
Ring of Gaxx
This ring is relatively unadorned, but the vile magic within radiates intense evil. Indeed, its creator, Kangaxx, was no less evil himself, even before millennia of undeath honed his power. It is said that a cadre of Netheril mages fought and imprisoned the demilich once, but being unable to truly destroy him they became liches themselves to stand guard over his remains. The construction of the ring may have led to their enmity, as each of the gem's nine facets was supposedly empowered by sacrifice and death.

STATISTICS:

Special abilities:
– Energy Drain (once per day)

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +2
– Saving Throws: +2
– Regeneration: 1 HP/round
– Protects Against: Disease and Poison

Weight: 0
This ring is relatively unadorned, but the vile magic within radiates intense evil. Indeed, its creator, Kangaxx, was no less evil himself, even before millennia of undeath honed his power. It is said that a cadre of Netheril mages fought and imprisoned the demilich once, but being unable to truly destroy him they became liches themselves to stand guard over his remains. The construction of the ring may have led to their enmity, as each of the gem's nine facets was supposedly empowered by sacrifice and death.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +2
- Jets de sauvegarde : +2
- Régénère 1 point de vie toutes les 6 secondes
- Résistance aux poisons : +100 %
- Immunité au sort Nuage mortel
- Immunité au sort Poison
- Immunité aux poisons
- Immunité à la maladie

Capacités de charge : 
- Energy Drain (1 fois par jour)

Poids : 0
RING40
Ring of Acuity
The origins of this ring are unclear, and while its enchantments share similarities with historical examples of Rings of Wizardry, there is something strange in how it feels, either in the weight of the metal or in the aura it projects, and it does not function the same. It was likely found on some distant plane, and as such, its maker will remain a mystery to you.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Spell Memorization: arcane spellcasters can memorize one extra spell of each level from 5th to 7th

Weight: 0
The origins of this ring are unclear, and while its enchantments share similarities with historical examples of Rings of Wizardry, there is something strange in how it feels, either in the weight of the metal or in the aura it projects, and it does not function the same. It was likely found on some distant plane, and as such, its maker will remain a mystery to you.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Mémorisation d'un sort profane supplémentaire de niveau 5, 6 et 7

Poids : 0
RING41
Ring of Protection +3
The Warder's Signet
Legend holds that this plain gold band was a gift from Ao to Helm as a reward for the God's stalwart service during the Time of Troubles. Helm, in turn, diluted and divided the ring and passed the gift on to his mortal followers. Scholars outside the church argue that Ao seems above emotion or gratitude, and chalk the story up to propaganda for the faithful.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +3
– Saving Throws: +3

Weight: 0
The Warder's Signet
Legend holds that this plain gold band was a gift from Ao to Helm as a reward for the God's stalwart service during the Time of Troubles. Helm, in turn, diluted and divided the ring and passed the gift on to his mortal followers. Scholars outside the church argue that Ao seems above emotion or gratitude, and chalk the story up to propaganda for the faithful.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +3
- Jets de sauvegarde : +3

Poids : 0
RING42
Ring of the Wraith
The Specter's Ring
A ruthless assassin of Tethyr known only as the Specter used this ring to great effect many years ago. Striking completely unseen, his victims' demises were often attributed to angry ghosts and spirits. The wearer of this ring assumes a dark incorporeal form like that of a wraith, gaining many of its characteristics as well.

STATISTICS:

Special abilities:
– Improved Invisibility (once per day): 1 turn

Equipped abilities:
– Wraith Form: the wearer moves silently and cannot be backstabbed, is vulnerable only to magical weapons or attacks, and is immune to spells and abilities that don't affect incorporeal creatures

Weight: 0
The Specter's Ring
A ruthless assassin of Tethyr known only as the Specter used this ring to great effect many years ago. Striking completely unseen, his victims' demises were often attributed to angry ghosts and spirits. The wearer of this ring assumes a dark incorporeal form like that of a wraith, gaining many of its characteristics as well.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Furtivité : +100 %
- Résistance aux poisons : +100 %
- Immunité au sort Nuage mortel
- Immunité au sort Poison
- Immunité au sort Désintégration
- Immunité au sort Transmutation de la chair en pierre
- Immunité au sort Métamorphose d'autrui
- Immunité au sort Toile d'araignée
- Immunité au sort Glisse
- Immunité au sort Implosion
- Immunité au sort Tremblement de terre
- Immunité au sort Enchevêtrement
- Immunité aux poisons
- Immunité à la pétrification
- Immunité à la désintégration
- Immunité à la maladie
- Immunité contre les armes non-magiques
- 1 % de chance d'immuniser le porteur au sort Changement de forme
- 1 % de chance d'immuniser le porteur au sort Métamorphose
- 1 % de chance de résister aux attaques sournoises

Capacités de charge : 
- Improved Invisibility (1 fois par jour)

Poids : 0

RING46
Ring of Larloch
Soul Stealer
Larloch, the infamous necromancer turned lich, had an insatiable need for new souls for his research. The means he used to tear them from their living bodies and capture them are as myriad as they are terrifying. The uninitiated dabble with Larloch's artifacts at their own peril.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Maximum Hit Points: +10

Combat abilities:
– Vampiric: creatures struck by the wearer in melee are drained 1d4 Hit Points and transfer them to the wearer

Weight: 0
Soul Stealer
Larloch, the infamous necromancer turned lich, had an insatiable need for new souls for his research. The means he used to tear them from their living bodies and capture them are as myriad as they are terrifying. The uninitiated dabble with Larloch's artifacts at their own peril.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Points de vie maximum : +10
- À chaque attaque de mêlée réussie: Draine 1d4 points de vie si la cible possède du sang et les transfère au porteur

Poids : 0
RING47
Iron Thorn Ring
Cursed Ring of Slight Monsterism
This wrought-iron band is pitted and stained as if by acid. Between the two thorns formed by the band, a crude lump of silver on its head suggests the image of a skull against a black field, perhaps the symbol of Myrkul, Lord of Bones.

STATISTICS:

*CURSED*

Equipped abilities:
– Protects Against: Poison
– Zombification: wearer's appearance is set to that of a zombie
– Charisma: -4

Weight: 0
Cursed Ring of Slight Monsterism
This wrought-iron band is pitted and stained as if by acid. Between the two thorns formed by the band, a crude lump of silver on its head suggests the image of a skull against a black field, perhaps the symbol of Myrkul, Lord of Bones.

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Maudit : Ne peut être ôté qu'à l'aide d'un sort de Délivrance de la malédiction
- Charisme : -4
- Résistance aux poisons : +100 %
- Immunité au sort Nuage mortel
- Immunité au sort Poison

- Malédiction : Transforme le porteur en Zombie

RING94
Anneau
Un anneau est une fine lanière de métal précieux. Il sert en général d'ornement. Plus rarement, certains sont enchantés et permettent à quiconque les porte d'user de la magie qu'ils contiennent. Ils sont de ce fait très recherchés par les aventuriers.

PARAMÈTRES :

Poids : 0
Un anneau est une fine lanière de métal précieux. Il sert en général d'ornement. Plus rarement, certains sont enchantés et permettent à quiconque les porte d'user de la magie qu'ils contiennent. Ils sont de ce fait très recherchés par les aventuriers.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Résistance aux poisons : +100 %
- Le moral du porteur reste au plus haut
- Immunité au sort Beauté de la nature
- Immunité à l'horreur
- Immunité à la peur
- Immunité à la panique
- Immunité au drain de niveaux
- Immunité à la mort magique
- Immunité à la folie du berserker
- Immunité à la confusion
- Immunité à la pétrification
- Immunité à la fatigue
- Immunité aux poisons
- Immunité à la paralysie
- Immunité au sommeil

Poids : 0
RING95
Anneau
Un anneau est une fine lanière de métal précieux. Il sert en général d'ornement. Plus rarement, certains sont enchantés et permettent à quiconque les porte d'user de la magie qu'ils contiennent. Ils sont de ce fait très recherchés par les aventuriers.

RINGITF
Le Passeport de Batalista
Le grand mage Batalista conçut cet objet pour faciliter ses voyages dans le Plan du Feu et l'on dit qu'il convoqua à maintes reprises une salamandre de ce royaume pour l'aider à le fabriquer. Or les salamandres ne sont pas réputées pour leur patience et il n'aurait probablement pas dû importuner à ce point son « instructeur ». Le doigt qui portait l'anneau resta en effet insensible au brasier qui voulait s'emparer de sa tour. S'il avait conservé ce doigt, les choses se seraient mieux passées pour Batalista...

PARAMÈTRES :

Capacités d'équipement :
- Résistance au feu : +40 %

Poids : 0
Le grand mage Batalista conçut cet objet pour faciliter ses voyages dans le Plan du Feu et l'on dit qu'il convoqua à maintes reprises une salamandre de ce royaume pour l'aider à le fabriquer. Or les salamandres ne sont pas réputées pour leur patience et il n'aurait probablement pas dû importuner à ce point son « instructeur ». Le doigt qui portait l'anneau resta en effet insensible au brasier qui voulait s'emparer de sa tour. S'il avait conservé ce doigt, les choses se seraient mieux passées pour Batalista...

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Résistance au feu : +100 %

Poids : 0

RINGPICO
Anneau de contrôle de la terre +1
Si les récits des bardes sont vrais, il suffit de passer cet anneau pour commander à volonté tous les élémentaires de terre. Bien sûr les élémentaires de terre ne se contrôlent pas si facilement et il vaut mieux faire cela avec soin. Un élémentaire de terre en colère peut aisément réduire en bouillie un aventurier malhabile.

PARAMÈTRES :

Capacités d'équipement :
- Classe d'armure : +1

Capacités de charge :
- Charmer élémentaire de terre une fois par jour (jet de sauvegarde contre les sorts à +2 pour annuler)
  Portée : contact
  Durée : 45 secondes
  Zone d'effet : 1 élémentaire de terre

- Transmutation de la pierre en chair une fois par jour
  Portée : contact
  Zone d'effet : 1 créature

Poids : 0
Si les récits des bardes sont vrais, il suffit de passer cet anneau pour commander à volonté tous les élémentaires de terre. Bien sûr les élémentaires de terre ne se contrôlent pas si facilement et il vaut mieux faire cela avec soin. Un élémentaire de terre en colère peut aisément réduire en bouillie un aventurier malhabile.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Poids : 0
RINGWOLF


Capacités d'équipement : 
- Régénère 6 points de vie par seconde

Poids : 0
RODAXE
Rod of Lordly Might +3
Also called the Wrath of Three Kings, though not associated with any named king in particular, this rod was likely made in 1090 DR. It saw use during the Battle of the Bones, but for which side is uncertain as it was found amongst the dead after a larger skirmish. Untransformed, the rod may serve as a powerful club with defensive enchantments, but its true power lies in the seven studlike buttons along its length that unlock the rod's magic. The first four of these buttons extend and transform the rod into alternative forms: a flail of disruption, a flaming long sword, a hypnotic axe, and a spear of speed. The final three buttons, rather than transforming the rod itself, instead activate powerful abilities: the first creates a ghastly spectre of the wielder, terrifying all those who see it; the second completely paralyzes another creature, rendering them helpess when pointed at; and lastly, the third directly sucks at the life of the target, healing the wielder of the rod.

The rod is currently transformed into a battle axe.

STATISTICS:

Special abilities:
– Terrify (once per day): opponents within 15 ft. of the wielder flee in terror for 1 turn (save vs. Rod at -2 negates)
– Paralyze (once per day): a target is paralyzed for 5 rounds (save vs. Rod at -2 negates)
– Drain Life (once per day): target is drained 30 Hit Points and transfers them to the wielder (save vs. Rod at -2 for half)

Combat abilities:
– Confusing: 33% chance target is confused for 2 rounds (save vs. Spell negates)
– Sleeping: 33% chance target will fall asleep for 2 rounds (save vs. Spell negates)
– Stunning: 33% chance target is stunned for 1 round (save vs. Spell negates)

THAC0: +3
Damage: 2d4+3 (slashing)
Speed Factor: 3
Proficiency Type: Axe
Type: One-handed
Requires:
 10 Strength
 9 Intelligence

Weight: 10
Also called the Wrath of Three Kings, though not associated with any named king in particular, this rod was likely made in 1090 DR. It saw use during the Battle of the Bones, but for which side is uncertain as it was found amongst the dead after a larger skirmish. Untransformed, the rod may serve as a powerful club with defensive enchantments, but its true power lies in the seven studlike buttons along its length that unlock the rod's magic. The first four of these buttons extend and transform the rod into alternative forms: a flail of disruption, a flaming long sword, a hypnotic axe, and a spear of speed. The final three buttons, rather than transforming the rod itself, instead activate powerful abilities: the first creates a ghastly spectre of the wielder, terrifying all those who see it; the second completely paralyzes another creature, rendering them helpess when pointed at; and lastly, the third directly sucks at the life of the target, healing the wielder of the rod.

The rod is currently transformed into a battle axe.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- TAC0 de la main secondaire : -1
- Multiplicateur d'attaque sournoise : -2

Capacités de combat : 
- 33 % de chance d'endormir la cible pendant 2 rounds (jet de sauvegarde contre les sorts pour éviter)

Enchantement : +3
TAC0 : +3
Dégâts : 2d4 +3
Type de dégâts : Tranchant (Rod)
Facteur de vitesse : 3
Type de compétence : Hache
Type : Arme à 1 main

Poids : 10

Nécessite : 
- Force : 10
- Intelligence : 9
RODMACE
Rod of Lordly Might +3
Also called the Wrath of Three Kings, though not associated with any named king in particular, this rod was likely made in 1090 DR. It saw use during the Battle of the Bones, but for which side is uncertain as it was found amongst the dead after a larger skirmish. Untransformed, the rod may serve as a powerful club with defensive enchantments, but its true power lies in the seven studlike buttons along its length that unlock the rod's magic. The first four of these buttons extend and transform the rod into alternative forms: a flail of disruption, a flaming long sword, a hypnotic axe, and a spear of speed. The final three buttons, rather than transforming the rod itself, instead activate powerful abilities: the first creates a ghastly spectre of the wielder, terrifying all those who see it; the second completely paralyzes another creature, rendering them helpess when pointed at; and lastly, the third directly sucks at the life of the target, healing the wielder of the rod.

The rod is currently transformed into a flail.

STATISTICS:

Special abilities:
– Terrify (once per day): opponents within 15 ft. of the wielder flee in terror for 1 turn (save vs. Rod at -2 negates)
– Paralyze (once per day): a target is paralyzed for 5 rounds (save vs. Rod at -2 negates)
– Drain Life (once per day): target is drained 30 Hit Points and transfers them to the wielder (save vs. Rod at -2 for half)

Combat abilities:
– Disruption: undead creatures are destroyed (save vs. Spell negates)

THAC0: +3
Damage: 2d4+3 (crushing and piercing)
Speed Factor: 5
Proficiency Type: Flail
Type: One-handed
Requires:
 13 Strength
 9 Intelligence

Weight: 10
Also called the Wrath of Three Kings, though not associated with any named king in particular, this rod was likely made in 1090 DR. It saw use during the Battle of the Bones, but for which side is uncertain as it was found amongst the dead after a larger skirmish. Untransformed, the rod may serve as a powerful club with defensive enchantments, but its true power lies in the seven studlike buttons along its length that unlock the rod's magic. The first four of these buttons extend and transform the rod into alternative forms: a flail of disruption, a flaming long sword, a hypnotic axe, and a spear of speed. The final three buttons, rather than transforming the rod itself, instead activate powerful abilities: the first creates a ghastly spectre of the wielder, terrifying all those who see it; the second completely paralyzes another creature, rendering them helpess when pointed at; and lastly, the third directly sucks at the life of the target, healing the wielder of the rod.

The rod is currently transformed into a flail.

- TAC0 de la main secondaire : -1
- Régénère 1 point de vie toutes les 6 secondes
- Multiplicateur d'attaque sournoise : -3

TAC0 : +3
Dégâts : 2d4 +3

Facteur de vitesse : 5
Type de compétence : Flail
Type : Arme à 1 main

Poids : 10

- Force : 13
- Intelligence : 9
RODS02
Rod of Lordly Might +3
Also called the Wrath of Three Kings, though not associated with any named king in particular, this rod was likely made in 1090 DR. It saw use during the Battle of the Bones, but for which side is uncertain as it was found amongst the dead after a larger skirmish. RODS02A

RODS04
Rod of Smiting +4
Rods of Smiting are extremely uncommon weapons, though they can be very useful against some foes. This particular rod was last in the possession of a priest of Gond named Debian of Urmlaspyr. Debian was an eccentric adventurer, who took it upon himself to investigate every type of golem that had been reported in the realms. In many cases, the creator of the golem would send his or her creations after Debian for his snooping. Debian usually escaped without much personal harm. Unfortunately for Debian, his luck ran out when he investigated the lair of the Machinery Man, a bizarre lich who happened to be the creator of golems and other animated constructs. The Machinery Man's lab full of iron golems proved to be too much for Debian to overcome.

NOTE: Rod of Smiting is always considered to be of +4 enchantment when determining what it can hit.

STATISTICS:

Combat abilities:
– Golem Bane: +3 to THAC0 and +5 to damage against golems
– Shattering: golems are destroyed (save vs. Rod negates)

THAC0: +2
Damage: 1d6+2 (crushing)
Speed Factor: 2
Proficiency Type: Club
Type: One-handed
Requires:
 5 Strength

Weight: 3
Rods of Smiting are extremely uncommon weapons, though they can be very useful against some foes. This particular rod was last in the possession of a priest of Gond named Debian of Urmlaspyr. Debian was an eccentric adventurer, who took it upon himself to investigate every type of golem that had been reported in the realms. In many cases, the creator of the golem would send his or her creations after Debian for his snooping. Debian usually escaped without much personal harm. Unfortunately for Debian, his luck ran out when he investigated the lair of the Machinery Man, a bizarre lich who happened to be the creator of golems and other animated constructs. The Machinery Man's lab full of iron golems proved to be too much for Debian to overcome.

NOTE: Rod of Smiting is always considered to be of +4 enchantment when determining what it can hit.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- TAC0 : +3 contre les golems
- Inflige 5 points de dégâts contre les golems
- Multiplicateur d'attaque sournoise : -2

Capacités de combat : 
- Tue instantanément les golems (jet de sauvegarde contre la pétrification et la métamorphose pour éviter)

Enchantement : +4
TAC0 : +2
Dégâts : 1d6 +2
Type de dégâts : Contondant
Facteur de vitesse : 2
Type de compétence : Gourdin
Type : Arme à 1 main

Poids : 3

Nécessite : 
- Force : 5
RODS05
Rod of Terror +3
These twisted rods emanate an aura of evil even while inactive, and fill all who gaze upon them with unease. They are capable of projecting a wave of unspeakable horror upon a single foe, filling even the hardiest soul with acute dread, and were certainly created for nefarious use.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Charisma: -1

Combat abilities:
– Horrifying: target flees in terror for 2 rounds (save vs. Spell negates)

THAC0: +3
Damage: 1d6+3 (crushing)
Speed Factor: 1
Proficiency Type: Club
Type: One-handed
Requires:
 5 Strength

Weight: 3
These twisted rods emanate an aura of evil even while inactive, and fill all who gaze upon them with unease. They are capable of projecting a wave of unspeakable horror upon a single foe, filling even the hardiest soul with acute dread, and were certainly created for nefarious use.

- Charisme : -1
- Multiplicateur d'attaque sournoise : -2

- Inflige Horreur à la cible pendant 2 rounds (jet de sauvegarde contre les sorts pour éviter)

Dégâts : 1d6 +3
Type de dégâts : Contondant
Facteur de vitesse : 1
Type de compétence : Gourdin
Type : Arme à 1 main

Poids : 3

RODSPEAR
Rod of Lordly Might +3
Also called the Wrath of Three Kings, though not associated with any named king in particular, this rod was likely made in 1090 DR. It saw use during the Battle of the Bones, but for which side is uncertain as it was found amongst the dead after a larger skirmish. Untransformed, the rod may serve as a powerful club with defensive enchantments, but its true power lies in the seven studlike buttons along its length that unlock the rod's magic. The first four of these buttons extend and transform the rod into alternative forms: a flail of disruption, a flaming long sword, a hypnotic axe, and a spear of speed. The final three buttons, rather than transforming the rod itself, instead activate powerful abilities: the first creates a ghastly spectre of the wielder, terrifying all those who see it; the second completely paralyzes another creature, rendering them helpess when pointed at; and lastly, the third directly sucks at the life of the target, healing the wielder of the rod.

The rod is currently transformed into a spear.

STATISTICS:

Special abilities:
– Terrify (once per day): opponents within 15 ft. of the wielder flee in terror for 1 turn (save vs. Rod at -2 negates)
– Paralyze (once per day): a target is paralyzed for 5 rounds (save vs. Rod at -2 negates)
– Drain Life (once per day): target is drained 30 Hit Points and transfers them to the wielder (save vs. Rod at -2 for half)

Combat abilities:
– Returning: returns to the wielder's hand instantly after an attack is made
– Speed: 1 extra attack per round

THAC0: +3
Damage: 1d8+3
Damage Type (melee): Piercing
Damage Type (thrown): Missile
Speed Factor: 3
Proficiency Type: Spear
Type: Two-handed
Requires:
 5 Strength
 9 Intelligence

Weight: 10
Also called the Wrath of Three Kings, though not associated with any named king in particular, this rod was likely made in 1090 DR. It saw use during the Battle of the Bones, but for which side is uncertain as it was found amongst the dead after a larger skirmish. Untransformed, the rod may serve as a powerful club with defensive enchantments, but its true power lies in the seven studlike buttons along its length that unlock the rod's magic. The first four of these buttons extend and transform the rod into alternative forms: a flail of disruption, a flaming long sword, a hypnotic axe, and a spear of speed. The final three buttons, rather than transforming the rod itself, instead activate powerful abilities: the first creates a ghastly spectre of the wielder, terrifying all those who see it; the second completely paralyzes another creature, rendering them helpess when pointed at; and lastly, the third directly sucks at the life of the target, healing the wielder of the rod.

The rod is currently transformed into a spear.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Attaque par round : +1
- Multiplicateur d'attaque sournoise : -3

Capacités de combat : 
- Revient dans la main du lanceur

Enchantement : +3
TAC0 : +3
Dégâts : 1d8 +3
Type de dégâts : Perforant (Melee)
Type de dégâts : Projectile (Thrown)
Facteur de vitesse : 3
Type de compétence : Lance
Type : Arme à 2 mains

Poids : 10

Nécessite : 
- Force : 5
- Intelligence : 9
RODSWORD
Rod of Lordly Might +3
Also called the Wrath of Three Kings, though not associated with any named king in particular, this rod was likely made in 1090 DR. It saw use during the Battle of the Bones, but for which side is uncertain as it was found amongst the dead after a larger skirmish. Untransformed, the rod may serve as a powerful club with defensive enchantments, but its true power lies in the seven studlike buttons along its length that unlock the rod's magic. The first four of these buttons extend and transform the rod into alternative forms: a flail of disruption, a flaming long sword, a hypnotic axe, and a spear of speed. The final three buttons, rather than transforming the rod itself, instead activate powerful abilities: the first creates a ghastly spectre of the wielder, terrifying all those who see it; the second completely paralyzes another creature, rendering them helpess when pointed at; and lastly, the third directly sucks at the life of the target, healing the wielder of the rod.

The rod is currently transformed into a long sword.

STATISTICS:

Special abilities:
– Terrify (once per day): opponents within 15 ft. of the wielder flee in terror for 1 turn (save vs. Rod at -2 negates)
– Paralyze (once per day): a target is paralyzed for 5 rounds (save vs. Rod at -2 negates)
– Drain Life (once per day): target is drained 30 Hit Points and transfers them to the wielder (save vs. Rod at -2 for half)

Combat abilities:
– Fiery: target suffers 1d6 fire damage

THAC0: +3
Damage: 1d8+3 (slashing)
Speed Factor: 2
Proficiency Type: Long Sword
Type: One-handed
Requires:
 6 Strength
 9 Intelligence

Weight: 10
Also called the Wrath of Three Kings, though not associated with any named king in particular, this rod was likely made in 1090 DR. It saw use during the Battle of the Bones, but for which side is uncertain as it was found amongst the dead after a larger skirmish. Untransformed, the rod may serve as a powerful club with defensive enchantments, but its true power lies in the seven studlike buttons along its length that unlock the rod's magic. The first four of these buttons extend and transform the rod into alternative forms: a flail of disruption, a flaming long sword, a hypnotic axe, and a spear of speed. The final three buttons, rather than transforming the rod itself, instead activate powerful abilities: the first creates a ghastly spectre of the wielder, terrifying all those who see it; the second completely paralyzes another creature, rendering them helpess when pointed at; and lastly, the third directly sucks at the life of the target, healing the wielder of the rod.

The rod is currently transformed into a long sword.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Camouflage dans l'ombre : -50 %
- Multiplicateur d'attaque sournoise : -1

Capacités de combat : 
- Inflige 1d6 points de dégâts de feu à la cible

Enchantement : +3
TAC0 : +3
Dégâts : 1d8 +3
Type de dégâts : Tranchant (Rod)
Facteur de vitesse : 2
Type de compétence : Épée longue
Type : Arme à 1 main

Poids : 10

Nécessite : 
- Force : 6
- Intelligence : 9
ROSSLAND
Anneau du voleur des sables
Entre les mains d'un maître voleur pendant une génération, cet anneau fut employé de manière audacieuse sur les marchés d'Eauprofonde. Traversant la foule en plein jour, le gredin dérobait un nombre incalculable de bourses aux nobles et les remplaçait par des sacs remplis de sable afin de camoufler ses larcins. Son identité demeura à jamais inconnue, mais le nom de « Voleur des sables » fut maudit à sa place. La rumeur prétend qu'il a pris sa retraite et qu'il vit aujourd'hui parmi les nobles qu'il volait.

PARAMÈTRES :

Capacités de charge :
- Invisibilité une fois par jour
  Durée : 12 heures
  Zone d'effet : le porteur

Poids : 0
Entre les mains d'un maître voleur pendant une génération, cet anneau fut employé de manière audacieuse sur les marchés d'Eauprofonde. Traversant la foule en plein jour, le gredin dérobait un nombre incalculable de bourses aux nobles et les remplaçait par des sacs remplis de sable afin de camoufler ses larcins. Son identité demeura à jamais inconnue, mais le nom de « Voleur des sables » fut maudit à sa place. La rumeur prétend qu'il a pris sa retraite et qu'il vit aujourd'hui parmi les nobles qu'il volait.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités de charge : 
- Invisibilité pendant 500 jours (100 fois par jour)

Poids : 0
ROSSRING
Le cadeau d'Edventar
Cet anneau fut donné à Edventar, le chasseur et écumeur de récifs, par un groupe d'elfes aquatiques, ses amis de longue date. En effet, son aide pour mettre en déroute Yenandra de Dambrath la « Reine des Pirates », a été déterminante pour leur survie. Malgré cela, Yenandra continua d'être redoutée partout où la mer rencontrait la terre.

PARAMÈTRES :

Capacités d'équipement :
- Le porteur est immunisé contre toute action, magique ou autre, affectant sa mobilité, ce qui inclut les sorts de Hâte et de Lenteur.

Poids : 0

- Immunité à la lenteur

SECRET05
Big Metal Unit +5
Found within a long forgotten pocket of our collected pantology, herein tales the lie of the Metal "Unit."

Gargantua was self-proclaimed lord of his immeasurable lower regions until his son, Pantagruel, questioned the accuracy of the ruler. With his shortcomings exposed, great Gargantua lay prostrate upon the ground while Pantagruel sought to cover his cuirass in case his now governing body lost its sway. He was warned that the people would cut him no slacks, but he never listened, and had burned his britches behind him. Undaunted, he fulfilled his animus with the robes of his father, as uncomfortable as that might sound, and shaped the Metal "Unit" with his own hands.

The rule of Pantagruel was a discommoding morass, his armor eventually suffering a breach in the breech that proved his undoing. As his basket left the pantry, so to speak, his regime fell to insurrection, and so complete was the sacking that not even his Metal "Unit" could be found. The component pieces, a pantaloon triumvirate, were lost in the annals of time.

You now bear the awesome responsibility of the Metal "Unit." Gussets of wind, seams like reality, pockets of resistance, the seat of power, and legs as flared as your temper. Polish it well; the onus is now on you.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Magic Resistance: +20%
– Protects Against: Backstabs

Armor Class: -10
Dexterity Penalty: -15%
Speed Factor Penalty: +4
Physical Resistance Bonus: +20%
Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +4
Stealth Penalty: -80%
Requires:
 15 Strength

Weight: 60
Found within a long forgotten pocket of our collected pantology, herein tales the lie of the Metal "Unit."

Gargantua was self-proclaimed lord of his immeasurable lower regions until his son, Pantagruel, questioned the accuracy of the ruler. With his shortcomings exposed, great Gargantua lay prostrate upon the ground while Pantagruel sought to cover his cuirass in case his now governing body lost its sway. He was warned that the people would cut him no slacks, but he never listened, and had burned his britches behind him. Undaunted, he fulfilled his animus with the robes of his father, as uncomfortable as that might sound, and shaped the Metal "Unit" with his own hands.

The rule of Pantagruel was a discommoding morass, his armor eventually suffering a breach in the breech that proved his undoing. As his basket left the pantry, so to speak, his regime fell to insurrection, and so complete was the sacking that not even his Metal "Unit" could be found. The component pieces, a pantaloon triumvirate, were lost in the annals of time.

You now bear the awesome responsibility of the Metal "Unit." Gussets of wind, seams like reality, pockets of resistance, the seat of power, and legs as flared as your temper. Polish it well; the onus is now on you.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure de base : -10
- Classe d'armure : +2 contre les projectiles
- Classe d'armure : +2 contre les armes perforantes
- Classe d'armure : +3 contre les armes tranchantes
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -4
- Facteur de vitesse : -4
- Dextérité : -15 %
- Camouflage dans l'ombre : -80 %
- Furtivité : -80 %
- Résistance à la magie : +20 %
- Résistance aux dégâts physiques : +20 %
- Immunité aux attaques sournoises

Poids : 60

Nécessite : 
- Force : 15

- Permet au porteur d'attaquer une créature cachée ou invisible

Poids : 0

SHAKTI1
Épée courte +4


Capacités d'équipement :

- Compétence martiale Short Sword / Ninjato : Passe à 2
- Hâte

TAC0 : +4

Type de compétence : Short Sword / Ninjato
Type : Arme à 1 main

SHALT01
Anneau
Un anneau est une fine lanière de métal précieux. Il sert en général d'ornement. Plus rarement, certains sont enchantés et permettent à quiconque les porte d'user de la magie qu'ils contiennent. Ils sont de ce fait très recherchés par les aventuriers.

PARAMÈTRES :

Poids : 0
Un anneau est une fine lanière de métal précieux. Il sert en général d'ornement. Plus rarement, certains sont enchantés et permettent à quiconque les porte d'user de la magie qu'ils contiennent. Ils sont de ce fait très recherchés par les aventuriers.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Résistance aux poisons : +100 %
- Le moral du porteur reste au plus haut
- Immunité au sort Pluie des dragons
- Immunité au sort Beauté de la nature
- Immunité au sort Croissance végétale
- Immunité au sort Enchevêtrement
- Immunité à l'horreur
- Immunité à la panique
- Immunité à la peur
- Immunité au drain de niveaux
- Immunité aux charmes
- Immunité à la folie du berserker
- Immunité à la confusion
- Immunité à la pétrification
- Immunité à la fatigue
- Immunité aux poisons
- Immunité à la paralysie
- Immunité au sommeil
- Immunité à l'étourdissement

Poids : 0

SHARARM
Sombremaille
Que ce soit du fait de sa conception ou d'une exposition à une chaleur intense au cours des batailles, les rangées de mailles de cette armure sont entièrement noircies. Bien que les légendes fassent plutôt référence à des chevaliers en armure étincelante affrontant de terribles monstres, les enchantements de résistance au feu sur celle-ci suggèrent des affrontements moins célèbres mais aussi terribles contre des créatures cracheuses de feu.

PARAMÈTRES :

Capacités d'équipement :
- Résistance au feu : +20 %

Classe d'armure : 2 (0 contre les armes tranchantes, 4 contre les armes contondantes)
Nécessite :
 8 en Force

Poids : 9
Que ce soit du fait de sa conception ou d'une exposition à une chaleur intense au cours des batailles, les rangées de mailles de cette armure sont entièrement noircies. Bien que les légendes fassent plutôt référence à des chevaliers en armure étincelante affrontant de terribles monstres, les enchantements de résistance au feu sur celle-ci suggèrent des affrontements moins célèbres mais aussi terribles contre des créatures cracheuses de feu.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure de base : -4
- Classe d'armure : -1 contre les armes contondantes
- Classe d'armure : +1 contre les projectiles
- Classe d'armure : +1 contre les armes perforantes
- Classe d'armure : +2 contre les armes tranchantes
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -2 (excepté pour les bardes)
- Facteur de vitesse : -2
- Dextérité : -5 %
- Camouflage dans l'ombre : -40 %
- Furtivité : -40 %
- Résistance au feu : +50 %
- Résistance aux poisons : +100 %
- Résistance aux dégâts physiques : +10 %
- Le moral du porteur reste au plus haut
- Immunité à l'horreur
- Immunité à la peur
- Immunité à la panique
- Immunité à la confusion
- Immunité à la mort magique
- Immunité aux poisons
- Immunité à l'étourdissement

Poids : 9

Nécessite : 
- Force : 8
SHARSWD
Épée bâtarde +1


Capacités d'équipement : 
- TAC0 de la main secondaire : -1
- Multiplicateur d'attaque sournoise : -2

Capacités de combat : 
- Inefficace contre les morts-vivants et les golems
- 51 % de chance d'être inefficace contre les cibles sensibles au poison
- 51 % de chance d'empoisonner la cible et de lui infliger 1 point de dégâts toutes les 5 secondes pendant 1 tour (jet de sauvegarde à -4 contre les souffles pour éviter)
- 51 % de chance de réduire de 1 la constitution de la cible pendant 1 tour (jet de sauvegarde à -4 contre les souffles pour éviter)
- 50 % de chance de réduire de 1 la dextérité de la cible pendant 1 tour (jet de sauvegarde à -4 contre les souffles pour éviter)
- 50 % de chance d'infliger lenteur à la cible pendant 1 tour (jet de sauvegarde à -4 contre les souffles pour éviter)

Enchantement : +4
TAC0 : +4
Dégâts : 1d10 +4
Type de dégâts : Tranchant
Facteur de vitesse : 2
Type de compétence : Épée bâtarde
Type : Arme à 1 main

Poids : 9

Nécessite : 
- Force : 11
SHILLE
Gourdin magique


TAC0 : +1
Dégâts : 2d4 
Type de dégâts : Contondant
Facteur de vitesse : 4
Type de compétence : Épée longue
Type : Arme à 1 main

Poids : 0

Nécessite : 
- Force : 5
SHLD01
Small Shield
A small shield is usually round and is carried on the forearm, gripped with the shield hand. Its light weight as compared to a medium shield permits the user to carry other items in that hand, although they cannot wield or carry another weapon.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +1

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +1
Requires:
 6 Strength

Weight: 6
A small shield is usually round and is carried on the forearm, gripped with the shield hand. Its light weight as compared to a medium shield permits the user to carry other items in that hand, although they cannot wield or carry another weapon.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +1
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -1
- Lorsque le porteur est touché ; Lance un sortilège

Poids : 6

Nécessite : 
- Force : 6

SHLD02
Small Shield +1
A small shield is usually round and is carried on the forearm, gripped with the shield hand. Its light weight as compared to a medium shield permits the user to carry other items in that hand, although they cannot wield or carry another weapon. This magical shield grants an extra bonus of +1 against attacks.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +2

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +1
Requires:
 6 Strength

Weight: 6

Its light weight as compared to a medium shield permits the user to carry other items in that hand, although they cannot wield or carry another weapon. This magical shield grants an extra bonus of +1 against attacks.

- Classe d'armure : +2
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -1

Its light weight as compared to a medium shield permits the user to carry other items in that hand, although they cannot wield or carry another weapon. SHLD02P
Pavois de qualité supérieure
Le pavois est un bouclier massif en métal ou en bois couvrant le guerrier pratiquement du menton jusqu'aux doigts de pied. Il doit être bien attaché sur l'avant-bras et maintenu solidement. Naturellement, la main prise ne peut servir qu'à maintenir le pavois en place. Ce pavois est de particulièrement bonne qualité, et se révèle plus léger et moins encombrant en combat.

PARAMÈTRES :

Capacités d'équipement :
- Classe d'armure : +1, +2 contre les projectiles

Nécessite :
 10 en Force

Poids : 10
Le pavois est un bouclier massif en métal ou en bois couvrant le guerrier pratiquement du menton jusqu'aux doigts de pied. Il doit être bien attaché sur l'avant-bras et maintenu solidement. Naturellement, la main prise ne peut servir qu'à maintenir le pavois en place. Ce pavois est de particulièrement bonne qualité, et se révèle plus léger et moins encombrant en combat.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +2 contre les projectiles
- Classe d'armure : +3
- TAC0 : -2
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -3

Poids : 10

Nécessite : 
- Force : 10
SHLD03
Medium Shield
A medium shield is carried in the same manner as a small shield. Unlike the small shield, however, its weight prevents the character from using his shield hand for anything other than carrying the medium shield. Medium shields are usually made of metal, range from three to four feet in diameter, and can be of any shape, from round to square to a spread dragon's wings. A typical medieval shield resembles a triangle with one point facing downward.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +2
– THAC0: -1

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +2
Requires:
 12 Strength

Weight: 15
A medium shield is carried in the same manner as a small shield. Unlike the small shield, however, its weight prevents the character from using his shield hand for anything other than carrying the medium shield. Medium shields are usually made of metal, range from three to four feet in diameter, and can be of any shape, from round to square to a spread dragon's wings. A typical medieval shield resembles a triangle with one point facing downward.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +2
- TAC0 : -1
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -2
- Lorsque le porteur est touché ; Lance un sortilège

Poids : 15

Nécessite : 
- Force : 12
SHLD03A
Medium Shield
A medium shield is carried in the same manner as a small shield. Unlike the small shield, however, its weight prevents the character from using his shield hand for anything other than carrying the medium shield. Medium shields are usually made of metal, range from three to four feet in diameter, and can be of any shape, from round to square to a spread dragon's wings. Poids : 15

Nécessite : 
- Force : 12
SHLD03P
Écu de qualité supérieure
L'écu se porte comme la rondache. Mais contrairement à la rondache, son poids ne permet pas au combattant de porter autre chose. Les écus sont généralement fabriqués en métal ; ils mesurent entre 90 cm et 1,20 m de diamètre et peuvent avoir n'importe quelle forme (carrée, ronde ou comme les ailes déployées d'un dragon). Un bouclier médiéval typique ressemble à un triangle dont un des angles pointerait vers le bas. Cet écu est de particulièrement bonne qualité, et se révèle plus léger et moins encombrant en combat.

PARAMÈTRES :

Capacités d'équipement :
- Classe d'armure : +1

Nécessite :
 8 en Force

Poids : 4
L'écu se porte comme la rondache. Mais contrairement à la rondache, son poids ne permet pas au combattant de porter autre chose. Les écus sont généralement fabriqués en métal ; ils mesurent entre 90 cm et 1,20 m de diamètre et peuvent avoir n'importe quelle forme (carrée, ronde ou comme les ailes déployées d'un dragon). Un bouclier médiéval typique ressemble à un triangle dont un des angles pointerait vers le bas. Cet écu est de particulièrement bonne qualité, et se révèle plus léger et moins encombrant en combat.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +2
- TAC0 : -1
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -2

Poids : 4

Nécessite : 
- Force : 8
SHLD04
Medium Shield +1
A medium shield is carried in the same manner as a small shield. Unlike the small shield, however, its weight prevents the character from using his shield hand for anything other than carrying the medium shield. Medium shields are usually made of metal, range from three to four feet in diameter, and can be of any shape, from round to square to a spread dragon's wings. A typical medieval shield resembles a triangle with one point facing downward. This magical shield grants an extra bonus of +1 against attacks.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +3
– THAC0: -1

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +2
Requires:
 12 Strength

Weight: 15
A medium shield is carried in the same manner as a small shield. Unlike the small shield, however, its weight prevents the character from using his shield hand for anything other than carrying the medium shield. Medium shields are usually made of metal, range from three to four feet in diameter, and can be of any shape, from round to square to a spread dragon's wings. A typical medieval shield resembles a triangle with one point facing downward. This magical shield grants an extra bonus of +1 against attacks.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +3
- TAC0 : -1
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -2

Poids : 15

Nécessite : 
- Force : 12
SHLD04A

A medium shield is carried in the same manner as a small shield. Unlike the small shield, however, its weight prevents the character from using his shield hand for anything other than carrying the medium shield. Medium shields are usually made of metal, range from three to four feet in diameter, and can be of any shape, from round to square to a spread dragon's wings. SHLD04P
Écu


Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +2
- TAC0 : -1
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -2

Poids : 15

Nécessite : 
- Force : 12
SHLD05
Large Shield
The body shield, also known as the kite or tower shield, is a massive metal or wooden shield reaching nearly from the chin to the toe of the user. It must be firmly fastened to the forearm and the shield hand must firmly grip it at all times. Naturally, this precludes use of the shield hand for anything but holding the body shield in places and fighting results more difficult because of the shield's encumbrance.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +3
– THAC0: -2

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +3
Requires:
 15 Strength

Weight: 45
The body shield, also known as the kite or tower shield, is a massive metal or wooden shield reaching nearly from the chin to the toe of the user. It must be firmly fastened to the forearm and the shield hand must firmly grip it at all times. Naturally, this precludes use of the shield hand for anything but holding the body shield in places and fighting results more difficult because of the shield's encumbrance.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +2 contre les projectiles
- Classe d'armure : +3
- TAC0 : -2
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -3
- Lorsque le porteur est touché ; Lance un sortilège

Poids : 45

Nécessite : 
- Force : 15
SHLD05A

SHLD05P
La Bénédiction de Corvyr
Ce bouclier a été utilisé par le haut paladin Corvyr durant l'assaut d'une célèbre forteresse morte-vivante. Bien après que ses compagnons soient tombés, il s'est écoulé des jours durant lesquels il a combattu un nombre apparemment infini de morts-vivants avant d'être finalement vaincu. La tour fut plus tard nettoyée à l'aide d'un certain cube magique de toute présence morte-vivante, c'est alors que le bouclier fut retrouvé. N'étant auparavant qu'une simple pièce d'équipement basique, ce bouclier a semble-t-il absorbé une partie de la résolution et de la volonté des derniers jours de Corvyr.

PARAMÈTRES :

Capacités d'équipement :
- Classe d'armure : +1
- Constitution : +1
- Jet de sauvegarde contre la mort : 150 %

Nécessite :
 12 en Force

Poids : 6
Ce bouclier a été utilisé par le haut paladin Corvyr durant l'assaut d'une célèbre forteresse morte-vivante. Bien après que ses compagnons soient tombés, il s'est écoulé des jours durant lesquels il a combattu un nombre apparemment infini de morts-vivants avant d'être finalement vaincu. La tour fut plus tard nettoyée à l'aide d'un certain cube magique de toute présence morte-vivante, c'est alors que le bouclier fut retrouvé. N'étant auparavant qu'une simple pièce d'équipement basique, ce bouclier a semble-t-il absorbé une partie de la résolution et de la volonté des derniers jours de Corvyr.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +2
- TAC0 : -1
- Jets de sauvegarde contre la paralysie, la mort et les poisons : +50 %
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -2
- Constitution : +1

Poids : 6

Nécessite : 
- Force : 12
SHLD06
Large Shield +1
The body shield, also known as the kite or tower shield, is a massive metal or wooden shield reaching nearly from the chin to the toe of the user. It must be firmly fastened to the forearm and the shield hand must firmly grip it at all times. Naturally, this precludes use of the shield hand for anything but holding the body shield in place and fighting results more difficult because of the shield's encumbrance. This magical shield grants an extra bonus of +1 against attacks.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +4
– THAC0: -2

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +3
Requires:
 15 Strength

Weight: 45

SHLD06P
Bouclier rouge
On sait peu de choses sur ce bouclier, si ce n'est qu'il a été fabriqué au Wealdath et qu'il semble avoir été enchanté spécifiquement pour combattre les monstres errants. Si sa qualité supérieure et ses enchantements en font une excellente pièce d'équipement, son véritable potentiel se révèle lorsque son propriétaire combat les monstres habitant Féérûne.

PARAMÈTRES :

Capacités d'équipement :
- Classe d'armure : +2
- +1 au TAC0 et +4 à la classe d'armure contre les ennemis de nature monstrueuse

Nécessite :
 12 en Force

Poids : 6
On sait peu de choses sur ce bouclier, si ce n'est qu'il a été fabriqué au Wealdath et qu'il semble avoir été enchanté spécifiquement pour combattre les monstres errants. Si sa qualité supérieure et ses enchantements en font une excellente pièce d'équipement, son véritable potentiel se révèle lorsque son propriétaire combat les monstres habitant Féérûne.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +3
- Classe d'armure : +2 
- TAC0 : -1
- Jets de sauvegarde : +2 
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -2

Poids : 6

Nécessite : 
- Force : 12
SHLD07
Shield of the Falling Stars +2
Ilmater himself enchanted this shield upon seeing a young squire's willingness to endure untold agony for the well-being of his mount. During a fierce battle between a human cavalry division and a hobgoblin horde, the young man was sent for reinforcements. He was beset by a cascade of arrows that nearly blocked out the sun, and he knew that even if he avoided the arrows himself, should his horse fall he would surely be doomed. With his shield and body he positioned himself to take the brunt of the onslaught, and was mortally wounded for it. His horse remained unscathed allowing for their escape, and his body was carried back to the nearest town, where he was resurrected from death.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +5
– THAC0: -2
– Shield Others: allies within 5 ft. gain +2 to Armor Class

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +3
Requires:
 15 Strength

Weight: 45
Ilmater himself enchanted this shield upon seeing a young squire's willingness to endure untold agony for the well-being of his mount. During a fierce battle between a human cavalry division and a hobgoblin horde, the young man was sent for reinforcements. He was beset by a cascade of arrows that nearly blocked out the sun, and he knew that even if he avoided the arrows himself, should his horse fall he would surely be doomed. With his shield and body he positioned himself to take the brunt of the onslaught, and was mortally wounded for it. His horse remained unscathed allowing for their escape, and his body was carried back to the nearest town, where he was resurrected from death.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +2 contre les projectiles
- Classe d'armure : +5
- TAC0 : -2
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -3

Poids : 45

Nécessite : 
- Force : 15
SHLD07A
Shield of the Falling Stars +2

With his shield and body he positioned himself to take the brunt of the onslaught, and was mortally wounded for it. His horse remained unscathed allowing for their escape, and his body was carried back to the nearest town, where he was resurrected from death.

– THAC0: -2
– Shield Others: allies within 5 ft. gain +2 to Armor Class

With his shield and body he positioned himself to take the brunt of the onslaught, and was mortally wounded for it. His horse remained unscathed allowing for their escape, and his body was carried back to the nearest town, where he was resurrected from death.

- Classe d'armure : +5
- TAC0 : -2
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -3

Poids : 45

Nécessite : 
- Force : 15
SHLD07P
La Vengeance de Sartessa
Il s'agit du bouclier personnel de Sartessa, une rôdeuse demie-elfe du Bois des Dents Acérées. Dès son jeune âge, Sartessa a reçu un appel divin la pressant de restaurer la paix sur la Côte des Épées en ces temps troublés, ce qui l'a amenée à voyager jusqu'à Luskan. Proche du but de son voyage, Sartessa a été trahie par son compagnon de longue-date et forcée de le tuer en se défendant contre ses assauts. À la suite de quoi elle a forgé ce bouclier, imprégné de sa détermination amère à accomplir sa quête tout en sachant que seule, elle ne pouvait qu'y trouver la mort. De puissants enchantements ont été placés sur cet objet pour l'empêcher de tomber entre de mauvaises mains, et même si certains se sont dissipés avec le temps, il serait vain à qui que ce soit qui ne lui ressemble ni en corps ni en esprit de tenter de le porter.

PARAMÈTRES :

Capacités d'équipement :
- Classe d'armure : +2, +4 contre les projectiles, les humanoïdes, les adversaire de sexe masculin et les créatures charmées ou contrôlées
- Aura nettoyée
- Protection contre les attaques sournoises
- Protection contre la mort
- Meilleures chances de coups critiques

Nécessite :
 3 en Force
 12 en Charisme

Poids : 5
Il s'agit du bouclier personnel de Sartessa, une rôdeuse demie-elfe du Bois des Dents Acérées. Dès son jeune âge, Sartessa a reçu un appel divin la pressant de restaurer la paix sur la Côte des Épées en ces temps troublés, ce qui l'a amenée à voyager jusqu'à Luskan. Proche du but de son voyage, Sartessa a été trahie par son compagnon de longue-date et forcée de le tuer en se défendant contre ses assauts. À la suite de quoi elle a forgé ce bouclier, imprégné de sa détermination amère à accomplir sa quête tout en sachant que seule, elle ne pouvait qu'y trouver la mort. De puissants enchantements ont été placés sur cet objet pour l'empêcher de tomber entre de mauvaises mains, et même si certains se sont dissipés avec le temps, il serait vain à qui que ce soit qui ne lui ressemble ni en corps ni en esprit de tenter de le porter.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +4
- Classe d'armure : +3 contre les projectiles
- Classe d'armure : +2 contre les humanoïdes
- Classe d'armure : +2 contre les hommes
- Classe d'armure : +2 contre les créatures contrôlées
- Classe d'armure : +2 contre les créatures charmées
- TAC0 : -2
- Jets de sauvegarde : +2 contre les humanoïdes
- Jets de sauvegarde : +2 contre les hommes
- Jets de sauvegarde : +2 contre les créatures contrôlées
- Jets de sauvegarde : +2 contre les créatures charmées
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -3
- Chance de coup critique : +35 %
- Paralyse les hommes
- Immunité aux attaques sournoises
- Permet de lancer plusieurs sorts par round

Poids : 5

Nécessite : 
- Force : 3
- Charisme : 12
SHLD08
Buckler
A buckler, also known as a target shield, is a small shield of wood or metal that fastens to the forearm. Because of its size, it is light and can be worn with very little restriction to movement.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +1
– No protection against missile attacks

Requires:
 4 Strength

Weight: 4
A buckler, also known as a target shield, is a small shield of wood or metal that fastens to the forearm. Because of its size, it is light and can be worn with very little restriction to movement.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : -1 contre les projectiles
- Classe d'armure : +1
- Lorsque le porteur est touché ; Lance un sortilège

Poids : 4

Nécessite : 
- Force : 4

SHLD09P
Bouclier de dévotion
Ce bouclier a été utilisé par une lignée de paladins de Velen, qui utilisaient des boucliers tels que celui-ci au cours d'expéditions montées sur les îles Nélanthères sous le patronage de Torm. L'histoire a surtout retenu leurs armures mémorables, qui les ont fait connaître sous le nom des Cavaliers Rouges, leur volonté sans faille et leur résistance. Ils représentaient une force vitale dans l'établissement de la paix de la région. Bien qu'ils se soient depuis longtemps dispersés, leur héritage est hautement recherché, car des traces de leur bénédiction infuse toujours les pièces d'armure qu'ils utilisaient, octroyant à leur porteur des pouvoirs divins et une résistance accrue.

PARAMÈTRES :

Capacités d'équipement :
- Classe d'armure : +2
- Points de vie : +10 %
- Permet de lancer un sort supplémentaire des niveaux 1 à 3

Nécessite :
 10 en Force

Poids : 6
Ce bouclier a été utilisé par une lignée de paladins de Velen, qui utilisaient des boucliers tels que celui-ci au cours d'expéditions montées sur les îles Nélanthères sous le patronage de Torm. L'histoire a surtout retenu leurs armures mémorables, qui les ont fait connaître sous le nom des Cavaliers Rouges, leur volonté sans faille et leur résistance. Ils représentaient une force vitale dans l'établissement de la paix de la région. Bien qu'ils se soient depuis longtemps dispersés, leur héritage est hautement recherché, car des traces de leur bénédiction infuse toujours les pièces d'armure qu'ils utilisaient, octroyant à leur porteur des pouvoirs divins et une résistance accrue.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +3
- TAC0 : -1
- Mémorisation d'un sort divin supplémentaire de niveau 1
- Mémorisation d'un sort divin supplémentaire de niveau 2
- Mémorisation d'un sort divin supplémentaire de niveau 1 et 2
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -2
- Points de vie maximum : +10 %

Poids : 6

Nécessite : 
- Force : 10

SHLD11
Small Shield
A small shield is usually round and is carried on the forearm, gripped with the shield hand. Its light weight as compared to a medium shield permits the user to carry other items in that hand, although they cannot wield or carry another weapon.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +1

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +1
Requires:
 6 Strength

Weight: 6

- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -1
- Lorsque le porteur est touché ; Lance un sortilège

Poids : 6

SHLD12A
Small Shield
A small shield is usually round and is carried on the forearm, gripped with the shield hand. Its light weight as compared to a medium shield permits the user to carry other items in that hand, although they cannot wield or carry another weapon.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +1

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +1
Requires:
 6 Strength

Weight: 6
A small shield is usually round and is carried on the forearm, gripped with the shield hand. Its light weight as compared to a medium shield permits the user to carry other items in that hand, although they cannot wield or carry another weapon.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +1
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -1
- Lorsque le porteur est touché ; Lance un sortilège

Poids : 6

Nécessite : 
- Force : 6
SHLD13
Medium Shield
A medium shield is carried in the same manner as a small shield. Unlike the small shield, however, its weight prevents the character from using his shield hand for anything other than carrying the medium shield. Medium shields are usually made of metal, range from three to four feet in diameter, and can be of any shape, from round to square to a spread dragon's wings. A typical medieval shield resembles a triangle with one point facing downward.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +2
– THAC0: -1

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +2
Requires:
 12 Strength

Weight: 15
A medium shield is carried in the same manner as a small shield. Unlike the small shield, however, its weight prevents the character from using his shield hand for anything other than carrying the medium shield. Medium shields are usually made of metal, range from three to four feet in diameter, and can be of any shape, from round to square to a spread dragon's wings. A typical medieval shield resembles a triangle with one point facing downward.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +2
- TAC0 : -1
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -2
- Lorsque le porteur est touché ; Lance un sortilège

Poids : 15

Nécessite : 
- Force : 12

SHLD15
Large Shield
The body shield, also known as the kite or tower shield, is a massive metal or wooden shield reaching nearly from the chin to the toe of the user. It must be firmly fastened to the forearm and the shield hand must firmly grip it at all times. Naturally, this precludes use of the shield hand for anything but holding the body shield in places and fighting results more difficult because of the shield's encumbrance.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +3
– THAC0: -2

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +3
Requires:
 15 Strength

Weight: 45
The body shield, also known as the kite or tower shield, is a massive metal or wooden shield reaching nearly from the chin to the toe of the user. It must be firmly fastened to the forearm and the shield hand must firmly grip it at all times. Naturally, this precludes use of the shield hand for anything but holding the body shield in places and fighting results more difficult because of the shield's encumbrance.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +2 contre les projectiles
- Classe d'armure : +3
- TAC0 : -2
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -3
- Lorsque le porteur est touché ; Lance un sortilège

Poids : 45

Nécessite : 
- Force : 15

SHLD17
Buckler +1
A buckler, also known as a target shield, is a small shield of wood or metal that fastens to the forearm. Because of its size, it is light and can be worn with very little restriction to movement. This buckler has some form of generic enchantment, making it more resistant to blows.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +2
– No protection against missile attacks

Requires:
 4 Strength

Weight: 4
A buckler, also known as a target shield, is a small shield of wood or metal that fastens to the forearm. Because of its size, it is light and can be worn with very little restriction to movement. This buckler has some form of generic enchantment, making it more resistant to blows.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : -2 contre les projectiles
- Classe d'armure : +2

Poids : 4

Nécessite : 
- Force : 4

SHLD19
Pellan's Shield +2
This dwarven-made shield was commissioned by Pellan of Tyr, a brash paladin known for unquestioning courage and an almost total lack of common sense. Upon hearing that a red dragon was ravaging the countryside, Pellan mounted his horse and rode off to do battle. As it happened, Pellan and his armor digested readily enough, but the shield gave the dragon severe stomach cramps. Subsequently coughed up, it lay in a hoard for years until retrieved by Pellan's son, a warrior who knew when to sneak.

Superior craftsmanship is supplemented by a permanent lightness spell, which makes the shield very easy to wield.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +5
– THAC0: -2

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +3
Requires:
 12 Strength

Weight: 45
This dwarven-made shield was commissioned by Pellan of Tyr, a brash paladin known for unquestioning courage and an almost total lack of common sense. Upon hearing that a red dragon was ravaging the countryside, Pellan mounted his horse and rode off to do battle. As it happened, Pellan and his armor digested readily enough, but the shield gave the dragon severe stomach cramps. Subsequently coughed up, it lay in a hoard for years until retrieved by Pellan's son, a warrior who knew when to sneak.

Superior craftsmanship is supplemented by a permanent lightness spell, which makes the shield very easy to wield.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +2 contre les projectiles
- Classe d'armure : +5
- TAC0 : -2
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -3

Poids : 45

Nécessite : 
- Force : 12

This dwarven-made shield was commissioned by Pellan of Tyr, a brash paladin known for unquestioning courage and an almost total lack of common sense. SHLD20
Kiel's Buckler +2
This is the buckler of Kiel the Legion-Killer, first-born son of Durlag Trollkiller and Clan-prince of his father's ill-fated tower. He was wielding it in his final hour as he rushed to warn his father of the doppelgangers' infiltration of their Clan-home. This light weight shield of excellent craftsmanship bears powerful magical enhancements, and it is said that part of Kiel's force of will imprinted itself upon this shield.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +3
– No protection against missile attacks
– Protects Against: Hold and Stun

Requires:
 4 Strength

Weight: 4
This is the buckler of Kiel the Legion-Killer, first-born son of Durlag Trollkiller and Clan-prince of his father's ill-fated tower. He was wielding it in his final hour as he rushed to warn his father of the doppelgangers' infiltration of their Clan-home. This light weight shield of excellent craftsmanship bears powerful magical enhancements, and it is said that part of Kiel's force of will imprinted itself upon this shield.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : -3 contre les projectiles
- Classe d'armure : +3
- Immunité à l'étourdissement
- Immunité à la paralysie

Poids : 4

Nécessite : 
- Force : 4
SHLD21
Red Dragonscale Shield +2
Another powerful item created by the warlock Wormsor, this shield consists of red dragon skin stretched over a heavy shield frame. The red background is adorned in a pattern that, when looked in the right way, reveals the face of an ancient dragon. Crafted to withstand a mighty red dragon's breath, the shield is also able to absorb shock waves of any kind of source (wing buffets, physical attacks, telekinesis, etc.).

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +4
– THAC0: -1
– Fire Resistance: +25%
– Force Absorbing: wielder gains +3 to saves vs. breath and is immune to everything that pushes them away

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +2
Requires:
 10 Strength

Weight: 10
Another powerful item created by the warlock Wormsor, this shield consists of red dragon skin stretched over a heavy shield frame. The red background is adorned in a pattern that, when looked in the right way, reveals the face of an ancient dragon. Crafted to withstand a mighty red dragon's breath, the shield is also able to absorb shock waves of any kind of source (wing buffets, physical attacks, telekinesis, etc.).

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +4
- TAC0 : -1
- Jets de sauvegarde : +3 contre les souffles
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -2
- Résistance au feu : +25 %
- Immunité au renversement

Poids : 10

Nécessite : 
- Force : 10
SHLD22
Mirror Shield +3
Angwile the Artificer was widely known among the svirfneblin as the foremost authority on beholders. While he was often derided during his lifetime as foolhardy and reckless, his studies of captive beholders led to the creation of many artifacts that are to this day highly sought after by deep gnomes and other denizens of the Underdark.

Among Angwile's most well-known creation there's the Mirror Shield. This shield looks and works like a normal shield, but instead of a coat-of-arms, the front is mirror-reflective, and the inside is crystal clear. The wearer can cover behind the shield and look through its clear surface, while beholder's rays are deflected away, and gaze attacks are nullified as opponents see their own reflected image.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +5
– THAC0: -1
– Protects Against: Gaze/ray attacks

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +2
Requires:
 12 Strength

Weight: 15
Angwile the Artificer was widely known among the svirfneblin as the foremost authority on beholders. While he was often derided during his lifetime as foolhardy and reckless, his studies of captive beholders led to the creation of many artifacts that are to this day highly sought after by deep gnomes and other denizens of the Underdark.

Among Angwile's most well-known creation there's the Mirror Shield. This shield looks and works like a normal shield, but instead of a coat-of-arms, the front is mirror-reflective, and the inside is crystal clear. The wearer can cover behind the shield and look through its clear surface, while beholder's rays are deflected away, and gaze attacks are nullified as opponents see their own reflected image.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +5
- TAC0 : -1
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -2
- Immunité au sort Vaporisation prismatique
- Immunité au sort Rayon rubis d'inversion
- Immunité au sort Rayon débilitant
- Immunité au sort Incinérateur d'Agannazar
- Immunité contre les attaques de regard

Poids : 15

Nécessite : 
- Force : 12
SHLD23
Fortress Shield +3
This shield, as tall as a man, is aptly named. With it, Phil Pious, a paladin of the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart, once held a marauding battalion of hobgoblin and kobold archers at bay till they exhausted their arrows. As the shield is almost as useful in melee as it is at range, he then slew each and every creature.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +6
– THAC0: -2
– Physical Resistance: +10%

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +3
Requires:
 15 Strength

Weight: 45
This shield, as tall as a man, is aptly named. With it, Phil Pious, a paladin of the Most Noble Order of the Radiant Heart, once held a marauding battalion of hobgoblin and kobold archers at bay till they exhausted their arrows. As the shield is almost as useful in melee as it is at range, he then slew each and every creature.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +2 contre les projectiles
- Classe d'armure : +6
- TAC0 : -2
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -3
- Résistance aux dégâts physiques : +10 %

Poids : 45

Nécessite : 
- Force : 15
SHLD23A
Bouclier forteresse
Ce bouclier presque aussi grand qu'un homme porte bien son nom. Avec, Phil Pieux, paladin de l'Ordre du Cœur radieux, put tenir en respect un bataillon d'archers hobgobelins et kobolds en maraude jusqu'à ce qu'ils aient épuisés leurs flèches. Comme le bouclier est presque aussi efficace dans la mêlée qu'à distance, il extermina ensuite ces créatures jusqu'à la dernière.

PARAMÈTRES :

Capacités d'équipement :
- Classe d'armure : +4, +7 contre les projectiles

Nécessite :
 15 en Force

Poids : 3
Ce bouclier presque aussi grand qu'un homme porte bien son nom. Avec, Phil Pieux, paladin de l'Ordre du Cœur radieux, put tenir en respect un bataillon d'archers hobgobelins et kobolds en maraude jusqu'à ce qu'ils aient épuisés leurs flèches. Comme le bouclier est presque aussi efficace dans la mêlée qu'à distance, il extermina ensuite ces créatures jusqu'à la dernière.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +8 contre les projectiles
- Classe d'armure : +6
- TAC0 : -2
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -3

Poids : 3

Nécessite : 
- Force : 15

Poids : 45

- Force : 15
SHLD24
Reflection Shield +1
Thought only a decoration from some forgotten festhall, this shield languished in the backroom of a shop until a young noble purchased it as parade armor. Its dormant enchantments were discovered when a later attempt on his life was foiled as the shield deflected away each attack back at the would-be assassins. Subsequent study has linked it to Myth Rhynn, or perhaps some other ancient excavation.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Missile Deflection: missile weapons are harmlessly deflected

NOTE: Magically created missiles like Melf's Acid Arrows, Flame Arrows, and Melf's Minute Meteors can be deflected, while magical projectiles like Lightning Bolts, Fireballs, and Magic Missiles cannot be.

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +2
– No protection against missile attacks

Requires:
 4 Strength

Weight: 4
Thought only a decoration from some forgotten festhall, this shield languished in the backroom of a shop until a young noble purchased it as parade armor. Its dormant enchantments were discovered when a later attempt on his life was foiled as the shield deflected away each attack back at the would-be assassins. Subsequent study has linked it to Myth Rhynn, or perhaps some other ancient excavation.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : -2 contre les projectiles
- Classe d'armure : +2
- Immunité contre les flèches de flamme bleue
- Immunité contre les attaques de regard
- Immunité contre les lances de jet
- Immunité contre les flèches
- Immunité contre les haches de jet
- Immunité contre les carreaux
- Immunité contre les billes
- Immunité contre les dagues de jet
- Immunité contre les flèchettes

Poids : 4

Nécessite : 
- Force : 4
SHLD24A
Bouclier de réflexion
Ce bouclier, qu'on pensait n'être qu'une décoration de salle de banquet, a longtemps été oublié dans l'arrière-salle d'une boutique, jusqu'à ce qu'un jeune noble en fasse l'acquisition pour compléter une armure de parade. Les enchantements qu'il contient furent révélés lors d'une tentative d'assassinat sur la personne du jeune homme, quand le bouclier renvoya toutes les flèches sur les tireurs. Une étude montra ensuite qu'il était lié au Myth Rhynn, ou peut-être à une autre excavation antique.

PARAMÈTRES :

Capacités d'équipement :
- Classe d'armure : +2
- Ne protège pas contre les projectiles
- Renvoie les projectiles vers leur lanceur

Nécessite :
 4 en Force

Poids : 3
Ce bouclier, qu'on pensait n'être qu'une décoration de salle de banquet, a longtemps été oublié dans l'arrière-salle d'une boutique, jusqu'à ce qu'un jeune noble en fasse l'acquisition pour compléter une armure de parade. Les enchantements qu'il contient furent révélés lors d'une tentative d'assassinat sur la personne du jeune homme, quand le bouclier renvoya toutes les flèches sur les tireurs. Une étude montra ensuite qu'il était lié au Myth Rhynn, ou peut-être à une autre excavation antique.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +2
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -1
- Renvoie les billes
- Renvoie les lances
- Renvoie les haches
- Renvoie les fléchettes
- Renvoie les dagues
- Renvoie les carreaux
- Renvoie les flèches

Poids : 6

Nécessite : 
- Force : 6
SHLD25
Shield of Harmony +2
Audn of the Field, Knight-Champion for the wizard Kekkim, carried this shield for most of his life. It protects the bearer from most forms of mind control, a benefit for a wizard who needed warrior allies to stay faithfully at his side. Both Kekkim and Audn have long since returned to the earth, leaving the shield to whomever might recover it from Kekkim's tower.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +3
– Protects Against: Charm, Confusion, and Domination

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +1
Requires:
 6 Strength

Weight: 6

- Immunité au sort Confusion
- Immunité à la confusion
- Immunité aux charmes

Poids : 6

Nécessite : 
- Force : 6
SHLD26
Shield of the Lost +2
This odd shield was constructed by nomads that once inhabited the forest of Mir, a group long since absorbed into "civilized" society and forgotten. Examination reveals fine weaving of animal and human hair bound together by enchantment, though how this was done is lost to time.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +4
– THAC0: -1
– Deflect Magic: one spell cast against the wearer is absorbed per turn

SHLD26A
Bouclier des disparus
Cet étrange bouclier fut forgé par des nomades qui habitaient la forêt de Mir, un peuple intégré à la société « civilisée » et oublié depuis longtemps. Un examen minutieux révèle un fin tissage de poils d'animaux et de cheveux humains liés par enchantement, mais le secret de cette réalisation s'est dissipé dans les volutes du temps.

- Classe d'armure : +3
- Résistance à la magie : +5 %

SHLD27
Saving Grace +3
Shields like this are first mentioned in ancient liturgies of Amaunator, in which the god's champions bear radiant shields against an infestation of undead. The shields made their first appearance in modern times in dramatic fashion, appearing miraculously at the altars of several of the deity's temples in the Year of Smoldering Spells, 1020 DR. Since that time, a number have been lost in battle, and not a few were stolen by foul creatures to prevent their use.

Once a holy artifact used by the elite sect of clerics and holy warriors called Sunmasters, part of the enchantments fled with their god's demise, but it still remain a powerful tool for any adventurer.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +5
– THAC0: -1
– Searing Light: creatures who strike the wearer in melee are blinded for 1 round, and undead creatures also suffer 2d6 magic damage (save vs. Spell neg. blindness)

Arcane Casting Time Penalty: +2
Requires:
 12 Strength

Weight: 15
Shields like this are first mentioned in ancient liturgies of Amaunator, in which the god's champions bear radiant shields against an infestation of undead. The shields made their first appearance in modern times in dramatic fashion, appearing miraculously at the altars of several of the deity's temples in the Year of Smoldering Spells, 1020 DR. Since that time, a number have been lost in battle, and not a few were stolen by foul creatures to prevent their use.

Once a holy artifact used by the elite sect of clerics and holy warriors called Sunmasters, part of the enchantments fled with their god's demise, but it still remain a powerful tool for any adventurer.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +5
- TAC0 : -1
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -2
- Lorsque le porteur est attaqué ; Lance un sortilège

Poids : 15

Nécessite : 
- Force : 12
SHLD27A
Grâce salvatrice
Autrefois un bouclier très puissant utilisé par les prêtres de Baine le Fléau, mais dont la plupart des enchantements ont disparu consécutivement à la chute du dieu. Il lui reste toutefois la base de sa protection magique, ce qui peut le rendre utile à n'importe quel aventurier.

Capacités d'équipement :
- Classe d'armure : +4

Nécessite :

SHLD28

Despite the effectiveness of the enchantments on this shield, it is otherwise nondescript and defies precise identification. Such standardization makes it likely that it is from the militia of some forgotten barony, though it is hard to be certain.

SHLD29
Medium Shield +2
A standard magical shield given to elite troops and bodyguards, this particular shield is relatively new. Forged recently by Taerom Fuiruim of Beregost, this shield has few stories to tell. Perhaps it will take a brave young warrior to perform legendary deeds while wearing it, to finally give it a history.

SHLD30
Large Shield +2
A shield of the elite Calimport Standing Dragoons mercenary company, a group long since disbanded due to political backstabbing. Having the best of equipment, their shields were powerfully protective in combat, though the size of the shield precludes the use of the shield hand for anything else and fighting becomes more difficult because of the shield's encumbrance.

– THAC0: -2
