XBOW13
Crossbow of Affliction +4
A devastating weapon, this crossbow unfortunately draws its power directly from the wielder. Some bowmen have used it regardless, and many to great effect, but the drawbacks must be carefully considered. Its most famous owner, Guil de Lyons, made good use of it fighting bandits in remote areas of Faerûn, but he ultimately fell when he lacked the strength to defend against a rare assailant that got within striking distance.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Maximum Hit Points: -10 penalty

Combat abilities:
– Scourging: 15% chance target is stricken with a disease, suffering 1 damage per second and slowness for 1 turn (save vs. Death at -2 negates)

THAC0: +5
Damage: +4 (missile)
Speed Factor: 0
Proficiency Type: Crossbow
Type: Two-handed
Requires:
 8 Strength

Weight: 4

XBOW15
Firetooth +4
A human adventurer from the Dalelands named Arioth Cooper used this crossbow on many of his journeys. Arioth had lived in a small community near the edge of Anauroch, the great desert. When a mysterious force emerged from the sands to destroy the village, Arioth's wife was killed. Through circumstance, Arioth became a wandering mercenary. Over time, Arioth became a great hero and champion for the innocents of Cormyr and the Dalelands, though he shied away from such praise. His worn, light crossbow was probably the secret of his many successes, though how he came in possession of such a powerful tool is not known. When Arioth died of old age, his wishes were that his equipment be sold off at an auction in Essembra, Battledale, and the proceeds given to the citizens of that village.

One of the most powerful crossbows in the realms, Firetooth has no need for ammunition, as it automatically launches magical bolts of fire.

NOTE: Firetooth requires no ammunition, but normal bolts cannot be fired with this crossbow. Fire Bolts are considered to be of +4 enchantment when determining what they can hit.

STATISTICS:

Combat abilities:
– Fire Bolt: target suffers 1d6 fire damage

THAC0: +5
Damage: 1d10+4 (missile)
Speed Factor: 0
Proficiency Type: Crossbow
Type: Two-handed
Requires:
 8 Strength

Weight: 4
A human adventurer from the Dalelands named Arioth Cooper used this crossbow on many of his journeys. Arioth had lived in a small community near the edge of Anauroch, the great desert. When a mysterious force emerged from the sands to destroy the village, Arioth's wife was killed. Through circumstance, Arioth became a wandering mercenary. Over time, Arioth became a great hero and champion for the innocents of Cormyr and the Dalelands, though he shied away from such praise. His worn, light crossbow was probably the secret of his many successes, though how he came in possession of such a powerful tool is not known. When Arioth died of old age, his wishes were that his equipment be sold off at an auction in Essembra, Battledale, and the proceeds given to the citizens of that village.

One of the most powerful crossbows in the realms, Firetooth has no need for ammunition, as it automatically launches magical bolts of fire.

NOTE: Firetooth requires no ammunition, but normal bolts cannot be fired with this crossbow. Fire Bolts are considered to be of +4 enchantment when determining what they can hit.

XBOW16
Firetooth +5
A human adventurer from the Dalelands named Arioth Cooper used this crossbow on many of his journeys. Arioth had lived in a small community near the edge of Anauroch, the great desert. When a mysterious force emerged from the sands to destroy the village, Arioth's wife was killed. Through circumstance, Arioth became a wandering mercenary. Over time, Arioth became a great hero and champion for the innocents of Cormyr and the Dalelands, though he shied away from such praise. His worn, light crossbow was probably the secret of his many successes, though how he came in possession of such a powerful tool is not known. When Arioth died of old age, his wishes were that his equipment be sold off at an auction in Essembra, Battledale, and the proceeds given to the citizens of that village.

The magical bowstring of Gond makes even the Firetooth Crossbow's enchanted missiles more accurate and more powerful.

NOTE: Firetooth requires no ammunition, but normal bolts cannot be fired with this crossbow. Fire Bolts are considered to be of +5 enchantment when determining what they can hit.

STATISTICS:

Combat abilities:
– Fire Bolt: target and opponents within 5 ft. suffer 1d8 fire damage

THAC0: +6
Damage: 1d10+5 (missile)
Speed Factor: 0
Proficiency Type: Crossbow
Type: Two-handed
Requires:
 8 Strength

Weight: 4
A human adventurer from the Dalelands named Arioth Cooper used this crossbow on many of his journeys. Arioth had lived in a small community near the edge of Anauroch, the great desert. When a mysterious force emerged from the sands to destroy the village, Arioth's wife was killed. Through circumstance, Arioth became a wandering mercenary. Over time, Arioth became a great hero and champion for the innocents of Cormyr and the Dalelands, though he shied away from such praise. His worn, light crossbow was probably the secret of his many successes, though how he came in possession of such a powerful tool is not known. When Arioth died of old age, his wishes were that his equipment be sold off at an auction in Essembra, Battledale, and the proceeds given to the citizens of that village.

The magical bowstring of Gond makes even the Firetooth Crossbow's enchanted missiles more accurate and more powerful.

NOTE: Firetooth requires no ammunition, but normal bolts cannot be fired with this crossbow. Fire Bolts are considered to be of +5 enchantment when determining what they can hit.

XOBAND01
Circlet
A circlet is a circular band, typically made of precious metal, worn on the head as an ornament or symbol of status. Circlets carrying low-level enchantments are commonly worn by mages across Faerûn.

STATISTICS:

Weight: 1
A circlet is a circular band, typically made of precious metal, worn on the head as an ornament or symbol of status. Circlets carrying low-level enchantments are commonly worn by mages across Faerûn.

Poids : 1
XOBAND02
Silver Circlet
A circlet is a circular band, typically made of precious metal, worn on the head as an ornament or symbol of status. This simple silver circlet is enchanted to help the wearer successfully resist and avoid attacks of various natures.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Saving Throws: +1

Weight: 1
A circlet is a circular band, typically made of precious metal, worn on the head as an ornament or symbol of status. This simple silver circlet is enchanted to help the wearer successfully resist and avoid attacks of various natures.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Jets de sauvegarde : +1

Poids : 1
XOBAND03
Eilistraee's Boon
This circlet is made of the purest silver, and is embedded with a shimmering green jewel that seems to emit a faint glow when caught by moonlight. It was blessed by the drow goddess Eilistraee, and is able to grant the wearer powerful protection against harmful magic for a short time.

STATISTICS:

Special abilities:
– Shield of the Archon (once per day): 1 turn

Weight: 1
This circlet is made of the purest silver, and is embedded with a shimmering green jewel that seems to emit a faint glow when caught by moonlight. It was blessed by the drow goddess Eilistraee, and is able to grant the wearer powerful protection against harmful magic for a short time.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités de charge : 
- Shield of the Archon (1 fois par jour)

Poids : 1
XOBAND04
Circlet of the Archmagi
This powerful circlet was enchanted to complement the powerful robes customarily worn by archmages, building even further upon their magical protections. Due to the nature of its enchantment, it can only be worn by mages.

STATISTICS:

Equipped abilities:
– Armor Class: +1
– Saving Throws: +1
– Magic Resistance: +5%

Weight: 1
This powerful circlet was enchanted to complement the powerful robes customarily worn by archmages, building even further upon their magical protections. Due to the nature of its enchantment, it can only be worn by mages.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure : +1
- Jets de sauvegarde : +1
- Résistance à la magie : +5 %

Poids : 1
XVARTIL
Épée courte


Capacités d'équipement : 
- TAC0 de la main secondaire : +1

Type de dégâts : Tranchant
Facteur de vitesse : 3
Type de compétence : Short Sword / Ninjato
Type : Arme à 1 main

Poids : 3

Nécessite : 
- Force : 5
XZARCLCK
Robe du mauvais archimage
Cette robe aux pouvoirs immenses protège son porteur contre toute forme d'attaque physique, tout en accroissant sa résistance à la magie et ses jets de sauvegarde. Étant donné la nature de ses enchantements, cette robe ne peut être portée que par les mages d'alignement mauvais.

PARAMÈTRES :

Capacités d'équipement :
- Classe d'armure : 5
- Jets de sauvegarde : +1
- Résistance à la magie : +5 %

Poids : 6
Cette robe aux pouvoirs immenses protège son porteur contre toute forme d'attaque physique, tout en accroissant sa résistance à la magie et ses jets de sauvegarde. Étant donné la nature de ses enchantements, cette robe ne peut être portée que par les mages d'alignement mauvais.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure de base : 5
- Jets de sauvegarde : +1
- Résistance à la magie : +5 %

Poids : 6
YAGAWH
Ashideena


Capacités d'équipement : 
- Multiplicateur d'attaque sournoise : -2

Capacités de combat : 
- Inflige 12 points de dégâts magiques contre les morts-vivants
- Inflige 1d10 points de dégâts de feu à la cible
- 50 % de chance de réduire de 1 la force de la cible pendant 3 rounds
- 50 % de chance de réduire de 1 la constitution de la cible pendant 3 rounds
- 50 % de chance d'infliger lenteur à la cible pendant 3 rounds
- 10 % de chance d'étourdir le porteur pendant 1 seconde
- 10 % de chance d'endormir la cible pendant 2 secondes
- 10 % de chance de renverser et sonner la cible pendant 2 secondes

Enchantement : +3
TAC0 : +5
Dégâts : 2d10 
Type de dégâts : Contondant
Facteur de vitesse : 7
Type de compétence : Marteau de guerre
Type : Arme à 1 main

Poids : 12

Nécessite : 
- Force : 14
ZILFGT
Armure d'écailles de dragon d'ombre
Cette besantine est conçue à partir d'écailles de dragon d'ombre. Un travail élégant et soigné subordonné aux considérations pratiques la rend à la fois belle et utile. Les écailles de dragon d'ombre offrent une protection supplémentaire contre l'acide.

PARAMÈTRES :

Capacités d'équipement :
- Résistance à l'acide : +50 %

Classe d'armure : 1 (-1 contre les armes tranchantes, 0 contre les armes perforantes et les projectiles)
Nécessite :
 6 en Force

Poids : 10
Cette besantine est conçue à partir d'écailles de dragon d'ombre. Un travail élégant et soigné subordonné aux considérations pratiques la rend à la fois belle et utile. Les écailles de dragon d'ombre offrent une protection supplémentaire contre l'acide.

PARAMÈTRES : 

Capacités d'équipement : 
- Classe d'armure de base : 1
- Classe d'armure : -1 contre les armes contondantes
- Classe d'armure : +1 contre les projectiles
- Classe d'armure : +1 contre les armes perforantes
- Classe d'armure : +2 contre les armes tranchantes
- Vitesse d'incantation des sorts profanes : -2 (excepté pour les bardes)
- Facteur de vitesse : -1
- Camouflage dans l'ombre : -20 %
- Furtivité : -20 %
- Résistance aux dégâts physiques : +5 %
- Hâte de manière permanente
- Téléporte aléatoirement le porteur auprès d'un ennemi à portée de vue, à chaque round

Poids : 10

Nécessite : 
- Force : 6
ZOMSEA
Épée courte


Capacités de combat : 
- 11 % de chance d'être inefficace contre les cibles sensibles au poison
- 11 % de chance d'être effectif contre les morts-vivants et les golems
- 11 % de chance d'inoculer une maladie qui inflige 1 point de dégâts de poison par seconde à la cible pendant 1 tour

Dégâts : 1d10 
Type de dégâts : Perforant
Facteur de vitesse : 3
Type de compétence : Épée longue
Type : Arme à 1 main

Poids : 3

Nécessite : 
- Force : 5
